p: The results of the analysis are presented as a reduction in the number of yeast in biofilm structure calculated from the formula: Reduction [% (CFU/cm 2)] = (log B − log A)/log B × 100 where: A—number of cells in biofilm in the presence of essential oil [CFU/cm 2], B—number of cells in biofilm structure without the addition of essential oil [CFU/cm 2].
